Text:
Thanks al lot. Dream Theaters new album rocks in awesome perfectionism. Mostly....

The link for this video which is found on DT's homepage, is from the production video.
'The Dark Eternal Night' is incredibly musicianship.

Is John Myung still a member of the band? You see him only like ten times in the video... Sucks...

Thanks anyway, nice upload!!

Yeah, he is, he's just really quiet for some reason, he like NEVER gets in any videos or anything and you can tell he looks noticeably uncomfortable when Mike had the camera on him.

I know next to nothing about the guy.

I'm glad you all like the upload, I ripped and encoded it myself.
is this the bonus DVD that comes with the special edition of the new album?
OMG how ignorant am I. If I only read the text first LOL
